IMP! themes

IMP! is easily customized. Default theme can be adjusted via custom CSS, but you can completely replace styles with your own. Some examples:

  • Add colors to default theme
  • Theme based on Typebase.CSS
  • The same, but heavily customized

You may use all themes, listed here, for free. Do whatever your want with them.
